description:
An update for Pokémon™ Y is now available from Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of “Pokémon Y” should download the update.

This will update the software to Version 1.5 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.

Please note that ”Pokémon™ X” cannot be updated using this data and you have to download the update data for “Pokémon X” separately.
name: Pokémon™ Y: Update
